about_the_game:
Embark on a journey through a dangerous and mysterious world where fires spread and burn, water flows and floods and pockets of gas suffocate. Get the Lay of the Land, explore the world and use the environment to your advantage.

How will you survive? Will you use powerful melee weapons and armor to charge into combat? Maybe you like to keep your distance and strike from the shadows? Or will you use powerful spells and become a master of the arcane arts. The choice is yours.

Explore

Discover many distinct biomes filled with unique locations and wildlife. Explore overgrown ruins, or take on a deadly temple to find the treasure hidden within. Descend down abandoned mineshafts or winding caverns and uncover the secrets they hold.

Encounter

Use the fully destructible world to your advantage in emergent encounters with a wide variety of bosses and monsters. Collapse the roof of a cave onto your foes or destroy a tree to have it fall onto an dangerous monster. Blow a hole in a wall to get the drop on your enemies.

Fight

Wield a wide variety of powerful weapons to defeat your foes and loot for new weapons and gear. Get up close and personal with an array of melee weapons or strike from afar with your arsenal of ranged armaments. Maybe you will learn and master the arcane arts and use magic to fell your enemies.

Build

Create anything from the simplest of homes to a magnificent castle. Use the full power of a voxel based building system to build anything your heart desires. Sculpt the terrain and unleash your creativity.
